comment: Big rye spice, hotter than its 11 years and 90 proof would suggest.  If you find this for the price I did do not pass it up. Got it for 9.99 on clearance at my local favorite bottle shop.  Wish I had bought both, one to savor.
Strong nose, with fruit, baking spice, leather. On the palate, smooth, with sour fruit, cinnamon, turpentine. Sweetness, but also an astringent rye note. Cacao nibs on the backend. 1/19/19

spicy cinnamon nose
apples. caramel
butter
I liked it a lot but you gotta like rye!
Nice aroma. The pepper of the rye is front and center. I liked it but at the price point there are ryed bourbons I like more.
